courses.title: HTML
courses.description: Learn the foundation of every website with HTML — structure your content like a pro.

courses.title: CSS
courses.description: Master modern styling techniques with CSS, Flexbox, and Grid — make your UI shine.

courses.title: JAVASCRIPT
courses.description: Build dynamic and interactive web experiences using JavaScript — the language of the web.

courses.title: REACT
courses.description: Learn to build fast and interactive UIs using React — the most popular frontend library.

courses.title: REDUX
courses.description: Manage complex application state easily with Redux — the ultimate state management tool.

courses.title: TAILWIND
courses.description: Style your application faster with Tailwind CSS — a utility-first framework for custom design.

courses.title: Next.js
courses.description: Build full-stack web apps with Next.js — powerful routing, SEO, and server-side rendering.

courses.title: Scss
courses.description: Write cleaner and modular CSS with SCSS — add variables, nesting, and more to your styles.

courses.title: TypeScript
courses.description: Write safer JavaScript using TypeScript — with static typing and better developer tooling.

courses.title: GIT & GITHUB
courses.description: Track your code and collaborate like a pro using Git and GitHub — essential for all developers.
